title: [Some peculiarities in the manifestation of oxidative stress and current status of antioxidant system in adolescents of different age groups with obesity, complicated by insulin resistance and without it].
abstract: Issledovaniia pokazali, chto ne?ro√©ndokrinnoe ozhirenie u podrostkov soprovozhdaetsia formirovaniem oksidativnogo stressa, kotory? bolee vyrazhen v rannem, chem v pozdnem pubertatnom vozraste. Soputstvuiushchaia ozhireniiu insulinorezistentnost' uvelichivaet proiavleniia oksidativnogo stressa na fone kompensatornogo povysheniia aktivnosti fermentov katabolizma i snizheniia moshchnosti antioksidantno? sistemy zashchity v pozdnem pubertatnom vozraste, chto otiagoshchaet prognoz dannogo zabolevaniia v dal'ne?shem. Predpolozhitel'no, chto mekhanizmy vozniknoveniia dannykh sdvigov mogut byt' obuslovleny vozrastnymi osobennostiami izmeneniia gormonal'no? sekretsii v usloviiakh insulinorezistentnosti v pozdnem pubertatnom vozraste.The study has shown that neuroendocrine obesity in adolescents is associated with the formation of oxidative stress which is more pronounced in early than in late puberty. Obesity with concomitant insulin resistance increases manifestations of oxidative stress accompanied by a compensatory increase in the activity of catabolic enzymes and reduced capacity of the defense antioxidant system in late puberty. These alterations may be caused by age-related changes in hormonal secretion under conditions of insulin resistance in late puberty.
